review: Dr sudhkar were friendly & explained  everything  about knee surgery.After 2 months of surgery  I  have consul ted & he was kind enough  to explain  my queries.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had to visit the doctor once for my fathers ankle sprain on June 6th and twice for my own ligament tear on June 26th and a follow up check today for the right ankle. What I had observed is Dr. Sudhakar analyses the injury keenly and prescribes the medicines (tablets or ointment) or other suggestions accordingly based on the need. He doesn't rush the patients for scans or X-ray unnecessarily and understands the pain of the patient exactly and tries to cure it. I would definitely suggest him for any sports injuries or orthopedic problems.

We visited the doctor to take the second opinon of the treatment already received by my wife from some other hospital because of some uneasiness experienced by her. He assured that the treatment was absolutely ok and hence we were much relieved by his assuarance. His behavior was very cordial and examimed the patient very carefully for which the patient gets much courage to fight the odd.

I was suffering from TFCC pain in the wrist and consulted Dr. G K Sudhakar Reddy and he suggested a forearm cast. All was well till here ***** * ***** ******* ********** **** ***** ***** ** **** *** *** *** First of all the doctor did not supervise the cast placement and the assistants placed the cast above my knuckle. After the cast was removed, since it had been directly pressing the knuckle joint, it caused a lot of damage to my hand. Earlier I had pain in just one site, after removing cast I have pain at multiple sites, making my life miserable.  * **** *** ********** *** *** *** **** *** *** ***** ********* ** *** **** ********** ***** ** * **** ******** ********** I don’t know when will I be ever pain free.

** ******** ******** *** ******** gave medicines for pain inside hip, sreading through the thighs. He asked x ray on next visit, since pain didn't subside. After x ray, he didn't find anything, again, prescribed another set of medicines. Pain continued, and now he is asking MRI  scan. 
I visited him earlier also, with another pain related issue, which was also not satisfactory.
reply_text:
Not all problems have a solution or a diagnosis in the initial presentation itself. 
I have requested further X-rays & scans after few days since you have had no relief with the initial medication. X-rays to find any bony issues and later MRI to find out any soft tissue problems. This is according to standard protocol as per your presentation. 
Pain, particularly chronic pain is a complex problem. Not all will get instant relief and there are no miracles!
We have to rule out any underlying organic condition with investigations.
Some people despite no major findings in the Xray/scans/tests may continue to have pain. This will require a multimodality approach and will gradually resolve.
Thank you

review:
First of all I would like to say Sorry to my earlier remarks. I admit that my observations during my first visit were not correct. 
Hospital and  Doctor Reddy were kind enough to grant me another visit and I was overwhelmed with his behaviour and his elaborate suggestions regarding my ailment. He is a very good Doctor and I have very high respect for him.He did not prescribe any unnecessary medicine.
I would once again apologize for my remarks . 
Ashok Kumar Bagaria
Patient 419455

He was such a cool person, was good listener, explained us the reason in such a way which was very understandable. His approach made us very comfortable to meet him again and even would like to refer to others . Was very humble loved this nature of doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr Sudhakar Reddy is very good.  He spends quality time in understanding the patients problems and treats well.  He has conducted bi-lateral knee replacement surgery for my mother.  The operation was done successfully and my mother recovered very fast.  I would recommend this doctor.

Felt really happy after visiting Dr. Sudhakar Reddy, sir. Listened to all the issues very patiently. Did complete diagnosis without any rush. Was recording all the findings so he doesn't miss any of the details.  He helped us in layman lauguage to make understand the problem and also no next steps.. the way sir handled was very nice.

review: I was suffering from sever heel/foot pain. I had visited doctor Sudhakar reddy in past as well and my experience was always good. He gives time to the patients and most importantly, he is always on time. He never prescribe unnecessary medication and always advice to do some exercise. Thank you Sir.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The doctor clearly listened to my issues.. How it happened and all.. He then checked my wrist and examined it. He explained everything in  detail about the cause and treatment. He didn't asked for random tests like many other docs do in the city. Plus he answered all my doubts and questions with clarity. Really recommend the doctor as he makes it easy for you to understand whats happening and what all to do

My mother-in-law was suffering with osteoarthritis and done the bilateral knee replacement . 

Before we reached to Dr.Sudhakar Reddy we were in perception that he is also like other doctors that we see now a days but after we met and explained about the pain she was feeling and previous history. He listen to us attentively and was explained the reason pretty well about the pain she was feeling. Before we reached Dr Sudhakar Reddy we were been to different hospitals and we never felt that they do best to their knowledge and experience. Dr Sudhakar Reddy was extremely humble and professional and treated patient like his own family member. The way he explained about how he his going to do surgery and post surgery treatment was pretty understandable. We have gone through the surgery on 9th of October. Day two after procedure made her stand up and day three made her to walk for few steps and with in five days she started walking with support. Now this is the second week she is walking alone. 
Overall I can rate him 10 out of 10 because I have seen him pretty  knowledgable, well experienced, dedicated towards patient, humble and more than that a great human being. I would certainly recommend him for knee replacemnets. I have never ever met a doctor like Dr. Sudhakar Reddy. He is exceptional.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is friendly and approachable. Hospital had staff and doctor on Sunday morning at 8am on new year weekend which is awesome. Doctors where not available elsewhere  till 10-11 am hence selected this. 
Very good but slightly expensive .  doctor tried different medication and was patient with the kid.   the treatment option recommended was going to cost 6000 INR. Alternate doctor gave option for 25 INR. As the difference is significant hence 4star and not 5 star. 
Facilities, availability of doctor, time given by doctor and nurse, flexibility of staff, cleanliness etc all are very good hence 4 star. Did not take the recommended treatment and went to second doctor only because hospital did not accept max bupa insurance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother is currently undergoing knee replacement surgery under Dr Sudhakar. He is very helpful, listens very carefully and  patiently to patient problems.  He is smiley, friendly that makes patient to tell their problems openly. He pay attention to what patient is saying and listens very carefully. He study the patient case fully before scribe the prescription. He does not write tests unless it is mandatory and don’t use over medication. He explains the problem and tell about what treatment and how is he going to do the treatment. It gives basic idea about treatment and prepare patient mentally.  He does not boast and not hiding any details. He takes care of his patients and help to resolve the problems by discussing with hospital authorities. I highly recommend the doctor.
Excellent  super treatment nice doctor nice place hospital looking very nice  no waiting time very nice doctor

He is very good and well experienced , I had pain in the right hip from 2 years and 2 months ago I underwent hip replacement surgery . Now i am able to walk properly using a stand and I really like the physiotherapy department the are very experienced and caring ....

My mother has pain in her leg, we thought that it is because of keen pain, doctor had asked to get x-ray of her both knees, found that knees are ok, there is no surgery required now. Doctor said There is swelling near to knee, because of this, she is getting pain.

My experience with doctor is he is nice doctor, has patience, asks all our problems, we can trust him.

I met with an accident in February 2016 and consulted a couple of orthopaedics and they all suggested surgery. I was not convinced as the bone was not totally broken off. I felt they want to make profits.
 I read Dr. Sudhakar and booked an appointment. By looking at the x-ray he said surgery is not required and he explained in what situations surgery is required. I felt happy and in the course of time my arm is fixed. I recommend Dr. Sudhakar.

Dr. Sudhakar Reddy is very experienced doctor and listens patients complaints and problems carefully. He is very good in identifying the patient problems by checking in all the ways, not like other doctors, just listening patient problems and prescribing the medicines. I suggest to my friends, colleagues and family about sudhkar reddy if they have any ortho related problems.

I was beyond impressed with my experience at this doctor’s office. * *** ********** ***** **** ** *** ******* *** **** ** **** A lot of doctors don’t realize how important it is to bridge the gap between patient and doctor. The first point of contact is crucial. ** ******** *** ****** ************* *** **** ** **** *********** ********** *** ************ I would highly recommend him  !”

Thanks to doctor Sudhakar Reddy

reply_text:
Sorry for the inconvenience caused. Allopathic medicines cause side effects / intolerance to few people. Please contact the emergency/ casualty where doctors are available 24hrs to guide you & will contact me if required rather than reception. 
Thank you

I had an ankle sprain/hairline fracture. The doctor was very caring and explained to me exactly what had gone wrong with my foot and why the injury hadnt healed. He answered all my doubts and even went to the XRay room himself to check the Xray.
He is very good doctor. He spent his valuable time with us. He asked clearly about our problem. He did not wrote any unnecessary medicines. I would recommend him as a good orthopaedic docter.
